overview: Wilco van Duinkerken is responsible for developing and executing Oleryâ€™s technical strategy, and leading the technology team. Prior to being named CTO of Olery in December 2011, Van Duinkerken spent 10 years as an entrepreneur in web development and multimedia, starting his first web development company at age 17. He holds a Masters in Business Informatics from Utrecht University in The Netherlands, where his research areas included transaction cost economics in software ecosystems, near shoring and governance, as well as IT business planning. Wilco also has practical experience in all stages of the web development process, researching, modeling and analyzing business processes and models from previously operating his startup companies.
